short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ice Princess Hidden Hearts is a wonderful online game with princess and hidden objects. Find out the hidden hearts in the scenes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Ice Princess Hidden Hearts" is a delightful online game that combines the charm of a princess-themed adventure with the excitement of hidden object challenges. Join Princess Elsa in this enchanting journey where your mission is to find the hidden hearts cleverly concealed within the captivating images of Elsa's world. Each level presents you with 10 hidden hearts to discover, and there are 6 levels to complete in total.

Time is of the essence, as you must locate all the hidden hearts before the clock runs out. Precision is keyâ€”if you click in the wrong spot too many times, you'll lose 5 seconds from your remaining time, adding an extra layer of challenge.

Immerse yourself in the magical realm of Princess Elsa, sharpen your observation skills, and race against the clock to find all the hidden hearts. If you're ready for a captivating and fun-filled adventure, start the game and enjoy the delightful journey with Princess Elsa!
